title: Can a student complete his class 11 syllabus in only 3 months? If yes then please tell how and if no then why. And if a person has wasted class 11 then how can he get on track? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can feel your concern ,i am also in 11th but i haven’t wasted my 11th and completed it twice(since i am a JEE Aspirant). Coming back to question, Yes, you can complete 11th syllabus within 3 months if your basics till 10th class are clear but you have to shift some chapters from class 11th to 12th , for example- In physics, you can skip Gravitation chapter and study it in 12th. Just work hard and surely you will. Believe in yourself and forget about results just give your 100%. Thank You, Signing Off Founder - BrainPills App PS : I am 16 yo entrepreneur too : ).
